---
title: "Anaconda and Spyder Installation Guide for Windows"
---

## Introduction

This guide will guide you through the installation process of Anaconda, a popular Python distribution, on your Windows computer. Anaconda facilitates the management of Python packages and environments, and it includes Spyder, a powerful IDE for scientific computing.

## Prerequisites

Before you begin, ensure you have the following:

1. A Windows computer.
2. An active internet connection.
3. Adequate disk space for the installation.

## Installation Steps

### 1. Download Anaconda

Visit the Anaconda download page at [https://www.anaconda.com/download](https://www.anaconda.com/download).

### 2. Choose the Windows Installer

Click on the "**Download**" button under the Windows section to download the Anaconda installer for Windows.

![Download Anaconda](../../../media/anaconda-windows/screenshot-1.png)

### 3. Run the Installer

- Locate the downloaded file, typically in your "_Downloads_" folder.
- Double-click the installer executable (`.exe`) file to run it.

![Run Installer](../../../media/anaconda-windows/screenshot-2.png)

### 4. Follow the Installer Wizard

- Follow the on-screen instructions to initiate the installation.
- Read and accept the license agreement when prompted.

![Read Me](../../../media/anaconda-windows/screenshot-3.png)

![License Agreement](../../../media/anaconda-windows/screenshot-4.png)

- Choose the installation type. It's recommended to select "**Just me**" unless you have specific reasons for a different choice.

![Installation Type](../../../media/anaconda-windows/screenshot-5.png)

- Select the installation location (the default is usually fine).

![Installation Location](../../../media/anaconda-windows/screenshot-6.png)

### 5. Install Anaconda

Click the "**Install**" button to begin the installation process. This may take a few minutes.

![Install](../../../media/anaconda-windows/screenshot-7.png)

### 6. Complete the Installation

Once the installation is complete, you'll see a confirmation message. Click "**Next**" and proceed to finish.

![Installation Complete](../../../media/anaconda-windows/screenshot-8.png)

![Close Installation Wizard](../../../media/anaconda-windows/screenshot-10.png)

### 7. If prompted to update the navigator, select "_No, don't show again_"

![Don't Update](../../../media/anaconda-mac/screenshot-10.png)

### 8. You're <u>NOT REQUIRED</u> to Log in/Sign up for Anaconda Cloud; close the prompt by clicking the "X" button

![Don't Log in/Sign up](../../../media/anaconda-windows/screenshot-11.png)

### 9. Access Spyder through Anaconda Navigator

- Open _Anaconda Navigator_, now installed on your system.
- Locate Spyder and click "**Launch**" to open the _Spyder IDE_.

![Launch Spyder](../../../media/anaconda-windows/Step_13.png)

![Spyder](../../../media/anaconda-windows/Step_14.png)

## Conclusion

Congratulations! Anaconda and Spyder are now successfully installed on your Windows computer. Utilize Spyder for scientific computing and Python development. 

For further guidance on using Anaconda, refer to the official documentation at [https://docs.anaconda.com/](https://docs.anaconda.com/). 

If you encounter any issues or have questions, seek assistance from the Anaconda community or consult the documentation for troubleshooting tips.
